title: An Introduction to Aussie sports
creator_credit: Stephen Skok and Australian Sports Commission
brief_description: Max Walker, ex-Australian cricketer, introduces an educational program designed to encourage greater on-going participation in sports by children. Outlines modified team games such as Softcrosse, modified hockey, mini-soccer and T-Ball. Describes the awards scheme for four Aussie Sports and makes reference to the resource manual accompanying the sports.
